name: Moon_Jump
description:
Moon Jump is a fun and challenging game developed by Silentek Game Studios and is a great time waster.

See if you can beat your friends and get the highest score possible.

Moon Jump will be available for free on pc (donations will be appreciated) and on android as a free version with ads and a paid version without ads.

Known issues:

Reset highscore is not currently working and you will have to delete app data to reset score. We know about the issue and we are working on it)

Any bug reporting can be sent to : info@silentek.co.za

Any donations will be appreciated and can be sent to paypal@silentek.co.za

Thanks to our sponsor www.webgiant.co.za for providing funda to aqquire licensing.

Have fun playing the game and follow us to keep up to date on future projects.

As soon as we finish them we will roll them out for you to enjoy.
